review: This is an amazing product - Especially for $39.  We use it in our bedroom and it works really well.The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I wish it had 2 features:1.  The remote doesn't glow and it's more complicated than the apple TV remote.2.  I wish it had some sort of HDMI pass through.  I hate having to switch TV input away from cable.  Honestly, I understand that Amazon wants you watching their service.  But I haven't cut the cord yet, and the fact that this is on a different input actually makes me watch it less.  Which is a shame, because it's a really good product.Having said that, it's $39 - Just buy it.
author: DanDadNJ
